Posts.Content: Jun 5, 2016 12:03PM Opal31 wrote: Thanks Tracy, that helped a lot! Those websites were also pretty helpful too-thanks "Mods"! I just want to get this surgery over with. I just hope that more don't just pop up in their place.
Posts.Title: Fibroadenoma Removal Surgery Opal31 Opal31

Posts.Content: Opal31 wrote: So, I'm 17 and found out that I had a fibroadenoma a few months back. I went in for a follow up ultrasound today and found out that not only had it gotten bigger, but that there were three more around it. My doctor's current suggestion is that I get at least the original surgically removed, since it's getting kinda big. I'm still a little nervous though of the thought of surgery, so I was wondering if those of you who have had a fibroadenoma removed could help me out. Will I probably have to stay overnight? Is there likely to be scarring? What is the postop like? Sorry if those are a lot of questions or if they're bad to ask, I'm just getting kinda anxious, is all. Thanks. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Fibroadenoma Removal Surgery Opal31 Opal31
